name: The Hundredth Hike
storyline: The Hundredth Hike is a story rich in lore, that is set in the middle of a devastating apocalypse. Napazarim has taken over the minds of 90% of the population causing hallucinations in the infected people in which became an international pandemic. You are one of the lucky few who survived and after losing your family, over the years you went on hikes all over the world to escape real life. This is YOUR Hundredth Hike how will it be different?
summary: The Hundredth Hike is an Indie Psychological Horror game, living the story of you, as a mountain hiker, reliving your tragic past and finding the calm of the nature under your boots. Unaware of what lies before you, you unleash a powerful and mysterious truth.
